articles.author: Jackie Wattles, CNN Business
articles.title: Virgin Orbit launches rocket off a 747 aircraft, puts nine satellites in space - CNN
articles.description: A 70-foot rocket, riding beneath the wing of a retrofitted Boeing 747 aircraft, detached from the plane and fired itself into Earth's orbit on Sunday — marking the first successful launch for the California-based rocket startup Virgin Orbit.
